WorkItem.Description:
According to Microsoft documentation, "The PropertyChanged event can indicate all properties on the object have changed by using either null or String.Empty as the property name in the PropertyChangedEventArgs." (https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.componentmodel.inotifypropertychanged.propertychanged(v=vs.110).aspx)

Bindings do not follow this rule and do not update when passing an empty string as the property name to PropertyChangedEventArgs.
WorkItem.Summary: Bindings do not update when notifying with an empty string as property name
